docs.snippet: On the reality show that Donald Trump began hosting in 2004, he displayed the showmanship and other traits that have come to define his 2016 presidential campaign....
docs.lead_paragraph: On the reality show that Donald Trump began hosting in 2004, he displayed the showmanship and other traits that have come to define his 2016 presidential campaign.
docs.abstract: Donald J Trump, presumptive Republican nominee for president, probably honed his self-promotion and showmanship skills during his 11-year stretch starring in NBC series The Apprentice; show, which highlighted Trump as successful business mogul, made him popular international media sensation and gave him visibility he could bank on during his 2016 presidential campaign.

headline.main: Donald Trump the Political Showman, Born on ‘The Apprentice’

byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and ASHLEY PARKER

docs.snippet: Mr. Pence’s reputation as a longstanding, implacable and dogged opponent of abortion has made him a hero to the country’s cultural conservatives....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Pence’s reputation as a longstanding, implacable and dogged opponent of abortion has made him a hero to the country’s cultural conservatives.
docs.abstract: Indiana Gov Mike Pence's history as staunch and implacable opponent of abortion has made him hero to country's cultural conservatives but puts him at odds with presidential running mate Donald Trump, who has been pro-choice in past and is now pro-life 'with caveats'; contrast is likely to complicate election.

headline.main: How Mike Pence Became a Conservative Hero: Unwavering Opposition to Abortion
headline.print_headline: Abortion Wars Brought Pence Praise of Right

byline.original: By MONICA DAVEY and MICHAEL BARBARO

docs.snippet: Over the span of his career, project after project has produced allegations of bad faith, broken promises, blatant lies or outright fraud....
docs.lead_paragraph: Over the span of his career, project after project has produced allegations of bad faith, broken promises, blatant lies or outright fraud.
docs.abstract: Records of Donald J Trump's business deals over past four decades show long history of dissembling and deception, at times bordering on blatant lying or fraud; survey reveals persistent pattern to way Trump bends truth, including consistent hyperbole and ability to evade accusations.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Deals Rely on Being Creative With the Truth
headline.print_headline: Trump’s Deals Rely on Creativity With the Truth

docs.lead_paragraph: Cleveland's police union called for the suspension of a state law allowing people to carry firearms during the Republican National Convention but Ohio's governor said he was powerless to act despite heightened security concerns with the killing on Sunday of three police officers in Louisiana.

docs.snippet: Stocks thrashed higher and lower in the second quarter — and didn’t go very far. With valuations and uncertainty high, where are investors to go?...
docs.lead_paragraph: Stocks thrashed higher and lower in the second quarter — and didn’t go very far. With valuations and uncertainty high, where are investors to go?
docs.abstract: Stock market ends second quarter hovering near record high following repeated ups and downs as investors reacted to uncertainty over interest rates hikes and Brexit referendum; analysts say investors will face fresh uncertainties in second half of year, and should look beyond mainstream of bull market for bargains.

headline.main: Stretch of Market Volatility Makes It Stormy at the Top
